channel.title: Azure OpenAI Current Models – Changes
channel.description: RSS feed of changes (new rows or field updates) detected in the 'Current models' tables.

item.title: Updated fields for [Text] o1-mini 2024-09-12: Retirement date: 'No earlier than October 27, 2025' → 'November 17, 2025', Replacement model: 'o4-mini' → 'o4-mini or gpt-5-mini'
item.description: Retirement date: 'No earlier than October 27, 2025' → 'November 17, 2025' Replacement model: 'o4-mini' → 'o4-mini or gpt-5-mini'
